Title: Gorillas in the Mist
Writer: Harold T.P. Hayes (article), Dian Fossey (work), Anna Hamilton Phelan (story), Tab Murphy (story), Anna Hamilton Phelan (screenplay)
Actors: Sigourney Weaver, Bryan Brown, Julie Harris, John Omirah Miluwi
Plot: Sigourney Weaver stars as Dian Fossey, in this true story about Fossey's study of gorillas, and her efforts to stop the decimation of the endangered apes.
Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 4 nominations.
Production: Universal Pictures, Guber-Peters Company, Warner Bros.
